Package se.cbb.jprime.prm

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AcyclicityVerifier
    Interface for verifiers of acyclicity on a PRM dependency structure or induced Bayesian network.
    ContinuousAttribute
    Interface for real-valued PRM attributes.
    DiscreteAttribute
    Interface for discrete valued PRM attributes.
    ProbAttribute
    Represents a fixed attribute of a PRM class, analogous to a column in a relational database table.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BooleanAttribute
    Defines a probabilistic boolean PRM attribute.
    Counts
    Represents a multidimensional array of value counts for a set of dependencies connecting a single child attribute and its parents.
    Dependencies
    Container to collect all PRM dependencies for a single child attribute.
    DependenciesCache<T>
    Stores data for a set of Dependencies.
    Dependency
    Represents a parent-child PRM dependency relationship between two probabilistic PRM attributes, possibly linked via a 'slot chain' (an ordered list of relations).
    DependencyValueMap  
    DirichletCounts
    For a discrete child PRM attribute and a set of discrete parent attributes, computes and stores counts of all entity value configurations (vp1,...,vpk,vc) for parent values vpi and child value vc.
    DoubleAttribute
    Defines a probabilistic double PRM attribute, either bounded or unbounded.
    FactorGraphBuilder
    Builds a factor graph from a "completed" PRM skeleton.
    FixedAttribute
    Represents a fixed attribute of a PRM class, analogous to a column in a relational database table.
    IntAttribute
    Defines a probabilistic integer PRM attribute, either bounded or unbounded.
    NaiveAcyclicityVerifier
    Very na√Øve (incomplete) verifier of PRM acyclicity.
    PRMClass
    Represents a 'PRM class', i.e., more or less the equivalent of a relational database table.
    RandomStructureGenerator
    Collects various methods for creating random PRM structures.
    Relation
    Represents a relation between two PRM classes (analogous to a link between two relational database tables).
    SimpleMicroarrayPRM
    Simple microarray PRM example.
    Skeleton
    Holds a PRM skeleton, providing access to PRM classes, and thereby indirectly to relations, attributes and the entities thereof.
    Structure
    Holds a PRM structure, that is, a set of parent-child dependencies.
    TestDirichletCounts
    JUnit test class for DirichletCounts.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ProbAttribute.DataType
    General type of data contained within.
    ProbAttribute.DependencyConstraints
    Type governing whether the attribute can be parent or child in a dependency structure.
    Relation.Type
    Relation type from A to B.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DependencyException
    Exception for PRM dependencies.
